TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供对设计器选项的访问；在 Visual Studio 开发环境中，设计器选项位于“选项”命令下的“工具”菜单上。

span.span: Provides access to the designer options located on the **Tools** menu under the **Options** command in the Visual Studio development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供用于检索和更新的 Windows 窗体设计器选项，它列出在对话框中显示的值的接口**选项**命令的**工具**菜单Visual Studio 开发环境。 provides an interface that can be used to retrieve and update the values of the Windows Forms Designer options, which are listed within the dialog displayed by the **Options** command of the **Tools** menu of the Visual Studio development environment. 方法检索指定选项的值。The method retrieves the value of a specified option. 方法设置的指定选项的指定的值。The method sets a specified value for a specified option. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问以显示标准选项的当前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName) cil managed
Public Function GetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName);

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 获取指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.
The value of the specified option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是没有任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 通常"常规"类别名称。The category name is typically "General". 因此，你可以访问与英语页名称"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的"常规"设计器的选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 始终应在英语中的页和值名称。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此下, 表可用于帮助你访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指示的英语值名称、 其数据格式，以及每个说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格方形的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每个网格方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性是只读的访问通过设计器选项服务时。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每个网格方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性是只读的访问通过设计器选项服务时。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格;`false`如果应不显示网格。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |网格线对齐SnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应对齐到网格;`false`如果位置应不一定对齐。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线，或`SnapToGrid`对齐到网格中，控件`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 将解决方案的自定义控件和组件自动添加**工具箱**; 否则为`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的值的方法来查询`GridSize`选项。The following code example demonstrates using the method to query for the value of the `GridSize` option. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: void SetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 设置指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\C*ategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是没有任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\C*ategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 通常"常规"类别名称。The category name is typically "General". 因此，你可以访问与英语页名称"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的"常规"设计器的选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 始终应在英语中的页和值名称。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此下, 表可用于帮助你访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指示的英语值名称、 其数据格式，以及每个说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格方形的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每个网格方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性是只读的访问通过设计器选项服务时。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每个网格方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性是只读的访问通过设计器选项服务时。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格;`false`如果应不显示网格。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |网格线对齐SnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应对齐到网格;`false`如果位置应不一定对齐。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线，或`SnapToGrid`对齐到网格中，控件`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 将解决方案的自定义控件和组件自动添加**工具箱**; 否则为`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.|
